ExtraItems.Name: Motivations
ExtraItems.Description: Kin usually fight for their ideals, usually to protect something they care about (even if that something is something as simple as their own survival).

ExtraItems.Name: Flee
ExtraItems.Description: Folk value their own lives and will usually surrender or flee if there's no chance of winning a fight. Martial-minded cultures like Islanders, Leggio, or Guilders might put up more of a fight.
